00005 EagleInstance* EagleInstance_New(int totalWorkers)
00006 {
00007     EagleInstance *instance = (EagleInstance*) malloc(sizeof(EagleInstance));
00008     instance->workers = EagleWorkers_New(totalWorkers, instance);
00009     instance->nextJobLock = EagleSynchronizer_CreateLock();
00010     return instance;
00011 }

00013 void EagleInstance_run(EagleInstance *eagle)
00014 {
00015     /* start workers */
00016     EagleWorkers_start(eagle->workers);
00017     
00018     /* close workers */
00019     EagleWorkers_joinAll(eagle->workers);
00020 }

00025 void EagleInstance_addPlan(EagleInstance *eagle, EaglePlan *plan)
00026 {
00027     eagle->plan = plan;

00030 EaglePlanJob* EagleInstance_nextJob(EagleInstance *eagle)
00031 {
00032     EaglePlan *plan = NULL;
00033     EaglePlanJob *job = NULL;
00034     int i;
00035     
00036     /* synchronize this function */
00037     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(eagle->nextJobLock);
00038     
00039     plan = eagle->plan;
00040     job = EaglePlanJob_New(plan, 4);
00041     
00042     for(i = 0; i < plan->usedProviders; ++i) {
00043         EaglePlanBufferProvider *provider = plan->providers[i];
00044         if(EaglePageProvider_pagesRemaining(provider->provider) == 0) {
00045             EaglePlanJob_Delete(job);
00046             job = NULL;
00047             break;
00048         }
00049         
00050         EaglePage_Delete(job->buffers[provider->destinationBuffer]);
00051         job->buffers[provider->destinationBuffer] = EaglePageProvider_nextPage(provider->provider);
00052     }
00053     
00054     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(eagle->nextJobLock);
00055     return job;
00056 }
00057 
00058 void EagleInstance_Delete(EagleInstance *eagle)
00059 {
00060     EagleWorkers_Delete(eagle->workers);
00061     EagleLock_Delete(eagle->nextJobLock);
00062     EaglePlan_Delete(eagle->plan);
00063     free(eagle);
00064 }
